body_html:
My training deadlocked again, but this time I had some information that was printed by NCCL_DEBUG=INFO python myscript.py. I got the following message repeated over and over:

transport/net_ib.cu:61 WARN IB Got async event : (null)

A quick search on google didn't return anything.
body_text:
My training deadlocked again, but this time I had some information that was printed by NCCL_DEBUG=INFO python myscript.py. I got the following message repeated over and over:
transport/net_ib.cu:61 WARN IB Got async event : (null)

A quick search on google didn't return anything.
body:
My training deadlocked again, but this time I had some information that was printed by `NCCL_DEBUG=INFO python myscript.py`. I got the following message repeated over and over:

```
transport/net_ib.cu:61 WARN IB Got async event : (null)
```

A quick search on google didn't return anything.
